metadata.title: CVE-2023-3079 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Type confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 114.0.5735.110 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
